item.title: [+1679] My favorite parasitic flatworm - The Oatmeal
[+1087] Model Describes Universe with No Big Bang, No Beginning
item.description: By suggesting that mass, time, and length can be converted into one another as the universe evolves, Wun-Yi Shu has proposed a new class of cosmological models that may fit observations of the universe better than the current big bang model. What this means specifically is that the ...

item.title: [+933] Mythbusters Have Renewed Their Contract For Another 7 Years
item.description: We sat down with MythBusters Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage to talk about comic book and sci-fi-movie myths they'd like to put to the test;and what we can expect from next season.

item.title: [+773] Is White Privilege a Myth?
item.description: Virginia Senator Jim Webb urges an end to government diversity programs, saying that they hurt deserving whites and benefit people not entitled to them. This is a debate we should have, but can we?

item.title: [+772] Business on Top, Party on the Sides (PIC)
[+756] Nigerians Finally Decide To “Reimburse” The Victims Of Scam
[+658] World of Warcraft Quitter: "I Was Addicted"
item.description: Nicky Haik was stuck at home sick for a week when he was 13. Out of boredom, he started playing WoW. Over the next five years, he spent somewhere between 175 and 200 solid days (4,000+ hours), playing the game. At 18 he finally decided it was time to quit, and did so earlier this month in extraordinary fashion.

item.title: [+627] Court: Marijuana Use NOT a Reason To Take Mother's Kids
item.description: The state cannot take children away from a mother simply because she tests positive for marijuana use, the Oregon Court of Appeals ruled on Wednesday. According to the decision, reversing a Marion County juvenile court ruling, the children can't be taken away without evidence showing the mother's cannabis use endangers the kids.

item.title: [+569] Dog Raves His Face Off (Video)
item.description: Like anyone at a rave, he's either really feeling the music, or he's got rabies.

item.title: [+519] This Puzzle is a Killer
item.description: Michigan machinist GarE Maxton makes many different types of interlocking solid puzzles of this type, but this one, which is he calls Intimidator, is his masterpiece. Starting the disassembly process requires a special key. Once diassembled, about 20 of the pieces can be recombined to make a functioning single-shot, golden pistol.

item.title: [+491] 10 Things Women Do That Men Love
item.description: without further ado, here are 10 Things That Only Women Can Do That I (and Most Guys in Their Right Minds) Love.

item.title: [+436] Dog Makes Crazy Escape From Captivity
[+412] iPad makes powerful impact amongst businesses
item.description: Apple, known for courting consumers with sleek designs and easy-to-use software, is making inroads with corporations that say the iPad can make workers more productive without putting sensitive customer information at risk.

item.title: [+403] 16 Of The Worst Television Spin Offs
item.description: Unfortunately, for every good spin off (Frasier) there are dozens of horrible ones, ranging from the boring to the downright unwatchable. Here are some of the worst.

item.title: [+400] 55 Ultimate Parking Lot Assholes (pics)
item.description: Anybody who’s ever driven has experienced the parking-lot asshole. He’s the guy who parks his $40,000 car like it cost him $4,000,000. He’s the guy who rams his Dodge Neon into the 5 feet of space left to the side of your well-parked car. Everyone hates a parking-lot asshole, and these are 55 examples of just how bad they can get.

item.title: [+371] Drugs
[+368] The 5 Worst Commercials On TV
item.description: Flo from Progressive... need I say more?

item.title: [+367] Kylie Minogue & The World’s Happiest Bear
[+349] GM Boosts Production Target of Chevy Volt By 50%
item.description: There's no better time to make a public announcement than when you have the President of the United States with you. Today,President Barack Obama visited the Detroit-Hamtramck plant where GM is building its Volt. They announced they would increase 2012 production of the Volt by a remarkable 50 percent due to strong and increasing public demand.

item.title: [+346] Here's How to Become A Millionaire
item.description: Do you want to become rich beyond your wildest dreams? The question may seem right out of a late-night infomercial — unless you consider the only strategy that may actually help you achieve that: Act poor.
